data.eml:eml: Periclimenaeus species (Crustacea: Decapoda: Pontoniinae) from Hawaii

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bruce, A. J. (2014): Periclimenaeus species (Crustacea: Decapoda: Pontoniinae) from Hawaii. Zootaxa 3754 (4): 461-472, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3754.4.7
